result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles Edward Holerud

records.addlTxt: for Treatment (Incompetency)
for Treatment (Incompetency)
Amended filed by Dr. Minter
ADA Walker objects to Mr. Holerud's request to modify the bond re: missed court appearances. Atty Perrin responds and requests the modification. Court: denies the request to modify bond at this time.

9:54 AM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud in court, in custody.  Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Charles Edward Holerud..  Attorney Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin.  21CF194, 22CF66, 22CF188 heard at this time. Dr Donna Minter appeared via zoom. Court: competency evaluation completed. Atty Perrin: defendant is contesting the competency finding. Dr Minter swn, ex by ADA Walker. Dr Minter's opinion is Mr. Holerud is not competent to stand trial without treatment. Dr. Minter states the date on the evaluation is incorrect, she met with him in August, not April. Atty Perrin x ex. 10:18 Dr. Minter is excused.  Charles Holerud is swn and ex by Atty Perrin. Defendant requests a signature bond. ADA walker requests the Defendant be transferred to a treatment center for treatment. Atty Perrin responds- Defendant willing to take medication. Court: the opinion of Dr. Minter is that the Defendant lacks the compacity to understand and he has a serious mental illness. Court finds the State has met the burden and finds Defendant incompetent to proceed, orders the Defendant to receive inpatient care and the involuntary administration medication and treatment if necessary. Medication is likely to render the Defendant competent. Court suspends these proceedings and remand Def to the custody of the DHS for inpatient treatment. Sheriff's Department is required to transport def to and from the facility Court will draft an order. 45 days credit 21cf194, 40 days in  22CF66,  30 days credit in  22CF188 10:36
Competency hearing on October 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:03 AM  Defendant Charles Edward Holerud appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Charles Edward Holerud.  Attorney Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin.  Includes 21CF194, 22CF66, 22CF188.  Court notes Competency Report from Dr. Minter, hearing needs to be set.  Court advises that before case was called Dr. Minter was contacted for scheduling.  She will be allowed to appear via Zoom.  Defendant questions Court re: bond, Court advises he needs to speak with his attorney.  Adjourned at 11:06 AM
Competency hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
DE from PCJ

3:17 PM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Shirlene Renee Perrin and Atty Liesl Nelson appear by phone, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. 22CF66 and 21CF194 (RW). Court questions non-appearance, he thought his hearing was scheduled for the 15th. Court will quash the warrants and reinstate the bonds on those cases. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:26 pm.
Status conference scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
DE in custody - E: DA, Atty & Email: Jail & Dispatch. eif

10:39 AM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud not in court.  Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Charles Edward Holerud.  Attorney Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin.  21CF194 and 22CF96 heard at this time. ADA Walker requests a warrant based on non appearance; defendant was in custody for evaluation and released. Atty Perrin: no information, believes Defendant will object to finding of competency findings. Court will authorize a warrant, a competency hearing will be set when Def is in custody. 10:43
completed by Donna L Minter, PhD
Status conference on September 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.

8:44 AM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin appeared by video for Charles Edward Holerud.  Attorney Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin.  21CF194 and 22CF66 heard at this time. Court: Mr Holerud did not appear for competency evaluation, warrant was issued and Def is to be held until the evaluation has been completed, Defendant can be released once the evaluation has been completed. Court will schedule a status conference to determine how to proceed. Counsel agrees. Court quashes warrant since Defendant is in custody. 8:48
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.
to Appear Remotely - for Defendant and Atty Perrin.
DE in custody - E: DA, Atty & Email: Jail & Dispatch. eif
from Judge Rohl to Donna Minter PhD's letter "Issue warrant for Mr. Holerud as discussed at his prior hearing."
from Donna Minter PhD re: Mr. Holerud was a no show for the scheduled evaluation on June 20, 2022.

*Clerk connected with Dr. Minter via Zoom in North Courtroom to assist in facilitating competency evaluation.  Defendant did not appear.  Dr. Minter left the Zoom meeting open for 30 minutes, still no appearance by Defendant.  She advised for us to contact her if he did appear but he did not.
Competency hearing on June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

01:00 PM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud in court with attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin.  Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 21CF194 and 22CF66 heard at this time. Court: Dr Minter was unable to connect with Defendant to conduct the examination. Atty Perrin would like to speak with def. 1:01 Court recesses. 1:05 Court resumes with appearances as previously noted. Atty Perrin: defendant does not have phone. Atty Perrin: contact Dr Minter today to set up an appoinment. Court: new order for competency evaluation to be completed. Court orders if Defendant does not set up an appointment or make the appointment within the next 30 days, the Defendant will be picked up and held until the examination can be completed. Court verifies address. 1:09

ADDRESS INFO for Charles Edward Holerud

Prior: 425 E. Wall Street, Ellsworth, WI 54011
Shirlene Perrin
Doc #9 erased because it was scanned upside down.

from Judge Rohl to Donna Minter, PhD's letter "I don't believe we have any other contact information for the defendant either. We will keep the June 15th hearing on the calendar. If Mr. Holerud appears we will get contact information and address issues."
from Donna Minter, PhD re: letter sent to Defendant was returned to me, no alternative means to contact him, therefore the evaluation time was given to another Defendant.
bail bond envelope, notice regarding bond posting, remote payment confirmation and booking sheet
Competency hearing on June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

08:32 AM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud in court, in custody.  Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 21CF194 and 22CF66 heard at this time. ADA Walker recites history of missed court appearances.  Requests a competency evaluation; concerns of Defendant understanding the charges against him. Court questions Defendant. Court orders a competency evaluation. Defendant to contact PD's for representation. Defendant requests a bond reduction. Court denies the request. Court explains procedure for obtaining a bail bond hearing date.  8:42  Competency hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on April 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:37 PM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud appears from Jail in person,  ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CF66 and 21CF194 (PH). DE states PD helped her out last time but the PD is now trying to find an attorney. ADA Walker states DE fired Atty Nelson. DE would like to plead NG and go to trial. ADA Walker is raising competency and would like to schedule a STC w/the Judge this week. Court adjourned at 3:44 pm.  Status conference scheduled for April 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 26, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Def from PCJ

3:02 PM Defendant Charles Edward Holerud appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson appears by phone, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.. DE wants the PD's Office to re-appoint counsel.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Complaint read aloud. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $100.00 w/conditions of AS, ojection. Court orders as requested by the State. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:19 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
